Package game.actions

Class TradeAction

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action
game.actions.TradeAction
public class TradeAction
extends Action
Represents a TradeAction that allows the Actor to buy or sell weapons with Merchant Kale. The TradeAction displays a menu of buyable and sellable weapons, along with their prices. The Actor can then choose to buy or sell a weapon, or exit the menu. Created by:

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    TradeAction​(java.util.List<WeaponItem> weaponInventory)
    Constructor for TradeAction that takes in a List of WeaponItems to use as inventory for trading.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String buyWeapon​(Actor actor, WeaponItem weapon)
    Buys a weapon item for an actor, if they have enough runes to afford it.
    java.lang.String execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Executes the TradeAction by displaying a menu of buyable and sellable weapons, along with their prices.
    java.lang.String menuDescription​(Actor actor)
    Returns a String describing the menu option for a given Actor, which is to trade with Merchant Kale.
    java.lang.String sellWeapon​(Actor actor, int weaponIndex)
    Sells a weapon from the actor's inventory and adds the selling price to the rune manager.

  • Constructor Details

    • TradeAction

      public TradeAction​(java.util.List<WeaponItem> weaponInventory)
      Constructor for TradeAction that takes in a List of WeaponItems to use as inventory for trading.
      Parameters:
      weaponInventory - List of WeaponItems available for trading.

  • Method Details

    • buyWeapon

      public java.lang.String buyWeapon​(Actor actor, WeaponItem weapon)
      Buys a weapon item for an actor, if they have enough runes to afford it.
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor buying the weapon item
      weapon - the weapon item being bought
      Returns:
      a string representing the result of the purchase, including the actor's name, the purchased weapon's name, and the price of the weapon. If the actor cannot afford the weapon, returns a string indicating thatthey cannot afford the weapon and have not bought anything.

    • sellWeapon

      public java.lang.String sellWeapon​(Actor actor, int weaponIndex)
      Sells a weapon from the actor's inventory and adds the selling price to the rune manager.
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor who sells the weapon
      weaponIndex - the index of the weapon to be sold in the actor's inventory
      Returns:
      a string indicating the success or failure of the selling operation

    • execute

      public java.lang.String execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Executes the TradeAction by displaying a menu of buyable and sellable weapons, along with their prices. The Actor can then choose to buy or sell a weapon, or exit the menu.
      Specified by:
      execute in class Action
      Parameters:
      actor - The Actor that is trading.
      map - The GameMap where the trading takes place.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the outcome of the trade.

    • menuDescription

      public java.lang.String menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      Returns a String describing the menu option for a given Actor, which is to trade with Merchant Kale.
      Specified by:
      menuDescription in class Action
      Parameters:
      actor - The Actor who will perform the menu option.
      Returns:
      A String describing the menu option.
